subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Martin Johnson arrived in 2008 and was charged with lifting England’s rugby team from the mediocrity that enveloped the team after 2003, but the success he had as a player has eluded him
snippet: Martin Johnson arrived in 2008 and was charged with lifting England’s rugby team from the mediocrity that enveloped the team after 2003, but the success he had as a player has eluded him
